issue.title: [C++] An unhandled race condition exists in ThreadPool
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15593](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15593). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A race condition exists at the ThreadPool which may lead to the loss of pending tasks after a process forks. 

See this issue for more detail: https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/12329
